00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDC
00038 
00039 #include <linux/module.h>
00040 #include <linux/kernel.h>
00041 
00042 #include <obd_class.h>
00043 #include "mdc_internal.h"
00044 #include <lustre_fid.h>
00045 
00046 /* mdc_setattr does its own semaphore handling */
00047 static int mdc_reint(struct ptlrpc_request *request, int level)
00048 {
00049         int rc;
00050 
00051         request->rq_send_state = level;
00052 
00053         mdc_get_mod_rpc_slot(request, NULL);
00054         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(request);
00055         mdc_put_mod_rpc_slot(request, NULL);
00056         if (rc)
00057                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "error in handling %d\n", rc);
00058         else if (!req_capsule_server_get(&request->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY)) {
00059                 rc = -EPROTO;
00060         }
00061         return rc;
00062 }
00063 
00064 /* Find and cancel locally locks matched by inode @bits & @mode in the resource
00065  * found by @fid. Found locks are added into @cancel list. Returns the amount of
00066  * locks added to @cancels list. */
00067 int mdc_resource_get_unused(struct obd_export *exp, const struct lu_fid *fid,
00068                             struct list_head *cancels, enum ldlm_mode mode,
00069                             __u64 bits)
00070 {
00071         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = exp->exp_obd->obd_namespace;
00072         union ldlm_policy_data policy = { {0} };
00073         struct ldlm_res_id res_id;
00074         struct ldlm_resource *res;
00075         int count;
00076         ENTRY;
00077 
00078         /* Return, i.e. cancel nothing, only if ELC is supported (flag in
00079          * export) but disabled through procfs (flag in NS).
00080          *
00081          * This distinguishes from a case when ELC is not supported originally,
00082          * when we still want to cancel locks in advance and just cancel them
00083          * locally, without sending any RPC. */
00084         if (exp_connect_cancelset(exp) && !ns_connect_cancelset(ns))
00085                 RETURN(0);
00086 
00087         fid_build_reg_res_name(fid, &res_id);
00088         res = ldlm_resource_get(exp->exp_obd->obd_namespace,
00089                                 NULL, &res_id, 0, 0);
00090         if (IS_ERR(res))
00091                 RETURN(0);
00092         LDLM_RESOURCE_ADDREF(res);
00093         /* Initialize ibits lock policy. */
00094         policy.l_inodebits.bits = bits;
00095         count = ldlm_cancel_resource_local(res, cancels, &policy,
00096                                            mode, 0, 0, NULL);
00097         LDLM_RESOURCE_DELREF(res);
00098         ldlm_resource_putref(res);
00099         RETURN(count);
00100 }
00101 
00102 int mdc_setattr(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00103                 void *ea, size_t ealen, struct ptlrpc_request **request)
00104 {
00105         struct list_head cancels = LIST_HEAD_INIT(cancels);
00106         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
00107         int count = 0, rc;
00108         __u64 bits;
00109         ENTRY;
00110 
00111         LASSERT(op_data != NULL);
00112 
00113         bits = MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE;
00114         if (op_data->op_attr.ia_valid & (ATTR_MODE|ATTR_UID|ATTR_GID))
00115                 bits |= MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP;
00116         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID1) &&
00117             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid1)))
00118                 count = mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid1,
00119                                                 &cancels, LCK_EX, bits);
00120         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp),
00121                                    &RQF_MDS_REINT_SETATTR);
00122         if (req == NULL) {
00123                 ldlm_lock_list_put(&cancels, l_bl_ast, count);
00124                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00125         }
00126 
00127         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_EPOCH, RCL_CLIENT, 0);
00128         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_CLIENT, ealen);
00129         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES, RCL_CLIENT, 0);
00130 
00131         rc = mdc_prep_elc_req(exp, req, MDS_REINT, &cancels, count);
00132         if (rc) {
00133                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00134                 RETURN(rc);
00135         }
00136 
00137         if (op_data->op_attr.ia_valid & (ATTR_MTIME | ATTR_CTIME))
00138                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "setting mtime "CFS_TIME_T
00139                        ", ctime "CFS_TIME_T"\n",
00140                        LTIME_S(op_data->op_attr.ia_mtime),
00141                        LTIME_S(op_data->op_attr.ia_ctime));
00142         mdc_setattr_pack(req, op_data, ea, ealen);
00143 
00144         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00145 
00146         rc = mdc_reint(req, LUSTRE_IMP_FULL);
00147         if (rc == -ERESTARTSYS)
00148                 rc = 0;
00149 
00150         *request = req;
00151 
00152         RETURN(rc);
00153 }
00154 
00155 int mdc_create(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00156                 const void *data, size_t datalen,
00157                 umode_t mode, uid_t uid, gid_t gid,
00158                 cfs_cap_t cap_effective, __u64 rdev,
00159                 struct ptlrpc_request **request)
00160 {
00161         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
00162         int level, rc;
00163         int count, resends = 0;
00164         struct obd_import *import = exp->exp_obd->u.cli.cl_import;
00165         int generation = import->imp_generation;
00166         struct list_head cancels = LIST_HEAD_INIT(cancels);
00167         ENTRY;
00168 
00169         /* For case if upper layer did not alloc fid, do it now. */
00170         if (!fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid2)) {
00171                 /*
00172                  * mdc_fid_alloc() may return errno 1 in case of switch to new
00173                  * sequence, handle this.
00174                  */
00175                 rc = mdc_fid_alloc(NULL, exp, &op_data->op_fid2, op_data);
00176                 if (rc < 0)
00177                         RETURN(rc);
00178         }
00179 
00180 rebuild:
00181         count = 0;
00182         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID1) &&
00183             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid1)))
00184                 count = mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid1,
00185                                                 &cancels, LCK_EX,
00186                                                 MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
00187 
00188         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp),
00189                                    &RQF_MDS_REINT_CREATE_RMT_ACL);
00190         if (req == NULL) {
00191                 ldlm_lock_list_put(&cancels, l_bl_ast, count);
00192                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00193         }
00194 
00195         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME, RCL_CLIENT,
00196                              op_data->op_namelen + 1);
00197         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA, RCL_CLIENT,
00198                              data && datalen ? datalen : 0);
00199 
00200         rc = mdc_prep_elc_req(exp, req, MDS_REINT, &cancels, count);
00201         if (rc) {
00202                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00203                 RETURN(rc);
00204         }
00205 
00206         /*
00207          * mdc_create_pack() fills msg->bufs[1] with name and msg->bufs[2] with
00208          * tgt, for symlinks or lov MD data.
00209          */
00210         mdc_create_pack(req, op_data, data, datalen, mode, uid,
00211                         gid, cap_effective, rdev);
00212 
00213         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00214 
00215         /* ask ptlrpc not to resend on EINPROGRESS since we have our own retry
00216          * logic here */
00217         req->rq_no_retry_einprogress = 1;
00218 
00219         if (resends) {
00220                 req->rq_generation_set = 1;
00221                 req->rq_import_generation = generation;
00222                 req->rq_sent = cfs_time_current_sec() + resends;
00223         }
00224         level = LUSTRE_IMP_FULL;
00225  resend:
00226         rc = mdc_reint(req, level);
00227 
00228         /* Resend if we were told to. */
00229         if (rc == -ERESTARTSYS) {
00230                 level = LUSTRE_IMP_RECOVER;
00231                 goto resend;
00232         } else if (rc == -EINPROGRESS) {
00233                 /* Retry create infinitely until succeed or get other
00234                  * error code. */
00235                 ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00236                 resends++;
00237 
00238                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: resend:%d create on "DFID"/"DFID"\n",
00239                        exp->exp_obd->obd_name, resends,
00240                        PFID(&op_data->op_fid1), PFID(&op_data->op_fid2));
00241 
00242                 if (generation == import->imp_generation) {
00243                         goto rebuild;
00244                 } else {
00245                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "resend cross eviction\n");
00246                         RETURN(-EIO);
00247                 }
00248         }
00249 
00250         *request = req;
00251         RETURN(rc);
00252 }
00253 
00254 int mdc_unlink(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00255                struct ptlrpc_request **request)
00256 {
00257         struct list_head cancels = LIST_HEAD_INIT(cancels);
00258         struct obd_device *obd = class_exp2obd(exp);
00259         struct ptlrpc_request *req = *request;
00260         int count = 0, rc;
00261         ENTRY;
00262 
00263         LASSERT(req == NULL);
00264 
00265         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID1) &&
00266             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid1)))
00267                 count = mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid1,
00268                                                 &cancels, LCK_EX,
00269                                                 MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
00270         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID3) &&
00271             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid3)))
00272                 count += mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid3,
00273                                                  &cancels, LCK_EX,
00274                                                  MDS_INODELOCK_FULL);
00275         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp),
00276                                    &RQF_MDS_REINT_UNLINK);
00277         if (req == NULL) {
00278                 ldlm_lock_list_put(&cancels, l_bl_ast, count);
00279                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00280         }
00281 
00282         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME, RCL_CLIENT,
00283                              op_data->op_namelen + 1);
00284 
00285         rc = mdc_prep_elc_req(exp, req, MDS_REINT, &cancels, count);
00286         if (rc) {
00287                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00288                 RETURN(rc);
00289         }
00290 
00291         mdc_unlink_pack(req, op_data);
00292 
00293         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER,
00294                              obd->u.cli.cl_default_mds_easize);
00295         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00296 
00297         *request = req;
00298 
00299         rc = mdc_reint(req, LUSTRE_IMP_FULL);
00300         if (rc == -ERESTARTSYS)
00301                 rc = 0;
00302         RETURN(rc);
00303 }
00304 
00305 int mdc_link(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00306              struct ptlrpc_request **request)
00307 {
00308         struct list_head cancels = LIST_HEAD_INIT(cancels);
00309         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
00310         int count = 0, rc;
00311         ENTRY;
00312 
00313         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID2) &&
00314             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid2)))
00315                 count = mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid2,
00316                                                 &cancels, LCK_EX,
00317                                                 MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
00318         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID1) &&
00319             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid1)))
00320                 count += mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid1,
00321                                                  &cancels, LCK_EX,
00322                                                  MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
00323 
00324         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp), &RQF_MDS_REINT_LINK);
00325         if (req == NULL) {
00326                 ldlm_lock_list_put(&cancels, l_bl_ast, count);
00327                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00328         }
00329 
00330         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME, RCL_CLIENT,
00331                              op_data->op_namelen + 1);
00332 
00333         rc = mdc_prep_elc_req(exp, req, MDS_REINT, &cancels, count);
00334         if (rc) {
00335                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00336                 RETURN(rc);
00337         }
00338 
00339         mdc_link_pack(req, op_data);
00340         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00341 
00342         rc = mdc_reint(req, LUSTRE_IMP_FULL);
00343         *request = req;
00344         if (rc == -ERESTARTSYS)
00345                 rc = 0;
00346 
00347         RETURN(rc);
00348 }
00349 
00350 int mdc_rename(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00351                 const char *old, size_t oldlen, const char *new, size_t newlen,
00352                 struct ptlrpc_request **request)
00353 {
00354         struct list_head cancels = LIST_HEAD_INIT(cancels);
00355         struct obd_device *obd = exp->exp_obd;
00356         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
00357         int count = 0, rc;
00358         ENTRY;
00359 
00360         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID1) &&
00361             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid1)))
00362                 count = mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid1,
00363                                                 &cancels, LCK_EX,
00364                                                 MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
00365         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID2) &&
00366             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid2)))
00367                 count += mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid2,
00368                                                  &cancels, LCK_EX,
00369                                                  MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
00370         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID3) &&
00371             (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid3)))
00372                 count += mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid3,
00373                                                  &cancels, LCK_EX,
00374                                                  MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP);
00375         if ((op_data->op_flags & MF_MDC_CANCEL_FID4) &&
00376              (fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid4)))
00377                 count += mdc_resource_get_unused(exp, &op_data->op_fid4,
00378                                                  &cancels, LCK_EX,
00379                                                  MDS_INODELOCK_FULL);
00380 
00381         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp),
00382                            op_data->op_cli_flags & CLI_MIGRATE ?
00383                            &RQF_MDS_REINT_MIGRATE : &RQF_MDS_REINT_RENAME);
00384         if (req == NULL) {
00385                 ldlm_lock_list_put(&cancels, l_bl_ast, count);
00386                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00387         }
00388 
00389         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_NAME, RCL_CLIENT, oldlen + 1);
00390         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_SYMTGT, RCL_CLIENT, newlen+1);
00391 
00392         rc = mdc_prep_elc_req(exp, req, MDS_REINT, &cancels, count);
00393         if (rc) {
00394                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00395                 RETURN(rc);
00396         }
00397 
00398         if (op_data->op_cli_flags & CLI_MIGRATE && op_data->op_data != NULL) {
00399                 struct md_open_data *mod = op_data->op_data;
00400 
00401                 LASSERTF(mod->mod_open_req != NULL &&
00402                          mod->mod_open_req->rq_type != LI_POISON,
00403                          "POISONED open %p!\n", mod->mod_open_req);
00404 
00405                 DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, mod->mod_open_req, "matched open");
00406                 /* We no longer want to preserve this open for replay even
00407                  * though the open was committed. b=3632, b=3633 */
00408                 spin_lock(&mod->mod_open_req->rq_lock);
00409                 mod->mod_open_req->rq_replay = 0;
00410                 spin_unlock(&mod->mod_open_req->rq_lock);
00411         }
00412 
00413         if (exp_connect_cancelset(exp) && req)
00414                 ldlm_cli_cancel_list(&cancels, count, req, 0);
00415 
00416         mdc_rename_pack(req, op_data, old, oldlen, new, newlen);
00417 
00418         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER,
00419                              obd->u.cli.cl_default_mds_easize);
00420         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00421 
00422         rc = mdc_reint(req, LUSTRE_IMP_FULL);
00423         *request = req;
00424         if (rc == -ERESTARTSYS)
00425                 rc = 0;
00426 
00427         RETURN(rc);
00428 }
